collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_description: Collection consists of 81 bound volumes of various radio and television scripts including the following radio programs: LifeWith Luigi, 1948-1953, Our Miss Brooks, December, 1953-June, 1954, Happy Island starring Ed Wynn, September, 1944-February, 1945, Let Yourself Go starring Milton Berle, March-June, 1945, The Eddie Cantor Show, 1945, 1947, The Jim Backus Show, 1948, Kiss and Make Up, 1946, Lefty, 1946, The Mighty Casey, 1947, Robert Q. Lewis's Little Show, 1947, and That's Rich, 1954.
